utterance: But what if they know something? Maybe they could help?
May the Force serve you well.
Will you look at that? Poor Mekel has gone and died on us. Tsk tsk. And here I thought he was good for at least one more.
No, Carth! Don't do it!
But what good is a single flicker of light against the sea of darkness I am drowning in? I can never atone for my betrayal.
I want you out of here! Off my ship!!
Of course I deserved to be punished. They found me innocent.
I demand justice! The Sandral family is a blight upon Dantooine! They must be punished!
All Republic forces pull back! Pull back!
Not for a monkey-lizard, no. Not bad at all.
I ask you for an honorable death, but you are too weak to even grant me that! No more words! This must end with blood!
Oh-ho! Spiteful little thing, aren't you? Let's not forget, however, who has whom at the disadvantage, shall we?
[Failure] I'm sorry, but I can't take the chance. Are you sure you can't buy it from me?
I'm not in the same situation, now. I wouldn't risk hurting you... or the others.
It's a bad year to try and become a Sith, you know... I've got it all wrapped up.
Time to teach you a lesson, shlummie! [hic] Maybe you'll think twice about coming up into our turf!
Uh... we aren't in your way, right? We don't want to... uh... get you mad or nothing.
I couldn't agree with you more. Just the sight of a Republic uniform makes me want to vomit. I can't wait until we crush them all like the pathetic vermin they are!
Listen, sister... just because we're working together does not mean you get to badger me with constant questions!
Commander Grann, report to the security desk immediately!
Kashyyyk will be ours once more!
Yes, your outsider concerns must always come first. Just remember that this was my home. You are the stranger here.
Bastila, I was wondering something. How did those Vulkars manage to capture a famous Jedi like you? Were you knocked out when your escape pod crashed?
I think you're interested in more than just the 'bond' between us.
None of my business? Uh, I'm sorry... aren't I a part of this mission? The Jedi may be in charge, but I'm risking all the same things you are!
Right. Off we go.
Greetings, my friend. *chuckle* I do rather enjoy saying that.
I might consider it. What are you going to call me, in exchange?
I just think about all the evil that the Sith have caused and I... I get so furious. Yet we are told that these feelings are the path to the dark side.
We destroyed each other. We desired the secrets of each other, to increase our power... we battled until finally our fortress rained down on top of us.
[Success] I... I think I should pull in some favors and... get us moved off-world, men.
I most certainly will not. What I have to say is for Bastila alone. It is... family business. That should be enough for her to come.
Look... I'm sure we can talk about this...
To which pillar do you wish to transfer power for the Mid-Lower System?
[Failure] See? Dishonesty! We are taking an incalculable risk in even considering training this one!
I have spent many years following in the memory of my father. I can't step away from a battle like this.
Never underestimate a Mandalorian. If I want, there won't be enough of you left to identify.
And I warn you, we've had troublemakers before. The bay is lined with autoguns. Violence is not a survivable option.
Will there be a place for me in your future? Do you... do you love me?
You felt it, yes? Another vision? The Force continues to work through us; showing us the Star Maps unearthed by Revan and Malak.
I think we both know the real reason you've been watching me.
You are... too strong for me. Gather your hatred and strike me down... if that is your will.
Worm!
I knew the off-worlder was a danger!
We wait for your return. Anyone with credits is always welcome.
You could reprogram the damaged assault droid to help you, if you have enough repair parts.
He was my son!!
Well, you picked a real stinkhole to stop at. Republic soldiers are everywhere, those arrogant Selkath treating us Sith like we're second-class citizens.
You are the only outsider that will survive us! We swear it!
Hey, why are you getting so mad at me? It's not like this was my fault!
Yeah, I knew you'd come through for me! You won't regret this... you'll see! Uh... just... just don't take too long, okay? This guy from the Exchange could stop by any day.
May the Force serve you well.
I... you know I can't feel that way about you. About any man. It isn't permitted. I am a Jedi, I must resist these temptations.
Hmph. You're as pathetic as they are, it looks like. Bah! I can't be bothered. Get out of here, all of you! The sight of you makes me sick to my stomach!
What do YOU want?
You didn't think I actually wanted to be a Sith, did you?
Ha ha ha! I like that one.
You... please, have you reconsidered? I must sell this desert wraid plate, but I have no license. Can you help?
Please, will no one help? We need the credits. We have nothing.
Ha ha ha! Oh, I wonder what Master Uthar will think of this! Alright, then... you have yourself a fight!
Your loss wasn't the worst I've seen. I saw Yuka's big crash on Taris two years ago.
Do you believe Uthar would not be aware of this? He would quickly figure out what you have to gain by betraying him... and would never believe someone would pass that up.
[Failure] Liar! The guards would have announced you! Gadon - we've been betrayed again!
[Force Persuade] You will find Sunry innocent.
[Force Persuade] You will let me inside.
Fine! Just take the thing and go, then. I'll deactivate the restraining bolt when you take possession.
You fool! You have no idea what you've done!
What... what are you talking about? I warn you, outsider, I won't tolerate your lies in my home.
Never! A Mandalorian will never fall before such as you!
That will never happen again, thanks to you. Curse the Council for sending you, of all people, to speak to her! Could you have done nothing else?!
Out of my way - unless you want to feel the wrath of the Sith!
Are you sure you want to die?
You are beneath my contempt, Juhani. When you felt the power of the dark side you fled to a cave like some cowering animal! You know nothing of the Force or its true potential!
*Sigh* I knew you wouldn't understand where I was coming from. Let me try to explain.
See! I knew that the off-worlder was guilty! They all are!
If the Republic cared at all they would laser the desert from orbit. Let's see the Sand People hide on a sheet of glass.
I... could have stopped him. I could have stopped it all.
That can be arranged. Remember what happened to Taris - Malak could do the same to the Core worlds!
We have to! We have to leave! The Selkath, they went crazy! They started killing anything that moved. Someone must have triggered the defense systems too, 'cause all the droids activated as well.
But how would you be able to trust me? How do you know I wouldn't turn on you when you faced Darth Malak? How do you know the dark side wouldn't make me betray you again?
Ha ha! Then I'd say you have quite an imagination. Not a bad thing, but not *quite* what I'm looking for in a proper Sith.
Bastila has told us of a most unusual development. She claims you and she have shared a dream, a vision of Malak and Revan in the ancient ruins here on Dantooine.
On that note, let's begin!
We're under attack! Guards! Guards!
Let's get these tests over with!
Do not think that we Selkath, the pinnacle of evolution, can be swayed by such means!
*groan*
You... you fool! You will never... never be a Sith, now!!
Manlorey bristag na laesfa. Manlorey bristag is na gon-disen!
We lose more of our most promising warriors everyday.
It is most regrettable that Juhani could not be saved. We in the Council had high hopes for her in the future.
What are you doing back here? Look, you got what you wanted, so just let us get back to corralling these animals.
I just can't believe he's dead. I... you should have stopped him! You should have done something to prevent this!
Quickly - I must inject it before it is too late. Yes... I feel it working!
Go on, leave me alone. I've got stuff to worry about.
But... even if it's not Revan... what if Master Uthar is actually dead? Someone who could kill the master...
Hurry, Hendar, hurry! I can hear it coming!
You are brave... and foolish. The dark side has wholly consumed me, and you will suffer for failing to see that!
This other student here that I captured earlier you should know well enough. His name is Mekel. Say hello, Mekel.
The Council must be told about what we have discovered! Meet me in the Council chambers.
Get lost, spacer. I've had enough of you.
I'm sorry, Woorwill. I didn't want you to know. So much is against us... you need someone to look up to.
Don't get me started on Czerka Corp.!
I know that. I'm not angry at you... don't think that. I must not be making much sense.
Oh, my!
You can count on seeing me later, though. My lightsaber has your name on it.
Oh, of course, Shaardan! Anything you command us!
No... I can't. The Selkath will get me! The Firaxa will eat us! I can't! I can't!
At last, my search is over! I was beginning to fear someone else had killed you and deprived me of the pleasure.
I don't want to talk about that.
Quickly - I must inject it before it is too late. Yes... I feel it working!
We should kill him now! Before anyone knows!
And what would you do? Harm me? You think you're wearing those clothes, here, and carrying those weapons? Interesting, really.
I always thought they held me back, were jealous of my power. But it is only because I was not good enough to meet their standards... I never have been.
[Failure] N-never! Your... your mind tricks... do not work on me! They are useless! As... as are you!
If only I could believe you. Let's... get this over with. Quickly.
Back off, I'm warning you! I'm not giving this up!
My daughter is not a harlot, Matale dog!
Please don't hurt me! I don't want a fight!
Be quiet! That is merely a myth, and not fit for outsiders to hear!
[Failure] You... you try to manipulate my mind off-worlder! We do not tolerate such insolence and disrespect for authority here on Manaan!
You have? Did Fazza give a good price? How much did you get for us?
You did it - you got the top time! You just beat racers who've been doing this for twenty years! This is amazing!
I... I must know something, first, before that happens. I must ask you something.
Oh, hey, it's you. I remember you at Fazza's place. Could I get you to help out a fellow hunter? Please?
You race, right? Know anything about contracts? Ah, I shouldn't get into it. It's my problem.
Do you miss your kin when they are taken from you, outsider? I doubt you feel the same as we do.
But now things have become so very complicated...
I doubt they'll have much to say to you, either. After that stuff with Nico, seems you're more a promotor than a racer.
They should all be wiped out. Every last one of them.
Mere rubbish? It's D-A02, the repair droid from my ship! What was this doing in the forest?
Oh, stop being such a baby. Are you always so quick to turn aside an ally? Got too many of them, do you?
To an outsider? You truly are a mad-claw. Don't taint my ears with your ravings. I'll speak to your owner, not you.
Bah! Tube-heads can't hunt. Why they allowed here?
AAAAHHHHHHH!!!
No... do not hurt me! I... I will do as you command. I will begin the ritual.
You gained an advantage and you share it freely? Let them rip the secret from my dead hands, I say! I mean... 'share it'?! Are you mad?!
You didn't kill her? How very foolish. Now you have an enemy to contend with. The holocron, itself, is an impressive item, however.
[Success] And I wouldn't want you to leave without this additional reward. Yes, of course I wouldn't.
I hear that the deal is pretty bad, but I'd take it in a second. I don't have Nico's skill, though.
You mean you sliced into our... That is a very serious crime! We could have you executed for treason if that information caused any harm!
You're rationalizing, Bastila. You're just scared to face the truth!
Go on, mercenary, leave me alone. I haven't the money to pay for your loyalty.
This is the place you have invaded. When I embraced the dark side, this was where I sought my solace. It is MINE!
*snort* Ha ha, boys, it talk to me! What you want, humee? Gurke has no time for you.
[Success] My droid... destroyed? No, no! This cannot be happening! I can't bear to live without him!
You admit to your crime!
Oh no, I'm not dealing with you again! You don't make a good business partner!
If I go back on my vow I am betraying myself, my people and my ancestors. I cannot do that. Please, Mission - join us.
I have every right! Shen is my son!
Please, make him open the gate. Hendar will die if he doesn't!
Remember my dying words. *cough* Remember them whenever *cough*... whenever you look at those you thought were your friends!
Back off! I'm no Padawan! I'm <FullName>. I just came here with Bastila.
Then it ends here.
[Force Persuade] You want to tell me.
He was new to hunting, but he was a good fighter. Used to be a soldier. We spent everything on his gear.
Promising? Hmmph. That one's not worthy to lick spit off your shoes, master.
Excellent. Soon all your secrets will be mine!
There is no emotion: there is peace. There is no ignorance: there is knowledge. There is no passion: there is serenity. There is no chaos: there is harmony...
Don't waste much thought on it. It was purely a personal matter that has no bearing today.
You... You insolent boy! If you want to live alone then so be it! I disown you! Never set foot in my house again!
Haha! Your kind always were weak-minded!
[Failure] Why you wave your arm like that? No flies in here. Go away, scaredy.
You monster! How can you say that? Somebody do something!
The Force has given us a... a vision. Like the one we shared on Dantooine. Did you see it? Of course... you must have. The Force is strong with us both.
[Force Persuade] But I'm your friend - you want to tell me what you know.
You're wrong Mission - I'm the Dark Lord now! Taste my wrath!
This is private property! By what authority are you trespassing on this estate?
[Apply anti-serum: small dosage.]
So, Bastila, I heard a rumor that the Vulkars captured you without much of a struggle. It must be embarrassing to be bested by a handful of street thugs.
I understand congratulations are in order! You've decided to join the Jedi rank and file! Jedi <FullName>!
Don't tell me not to take it personally, you hairless Wookiee!
So, Jolee, you decided to leave your little hermitage in the forest and come help us stop the Sith. I guess you realized this was worth coming out of retirement for, huh?
Take it... take it and the other blades, even... take them and go. My darkness awaits me...
You... are one of the Sith from the academy, yes? Would you happen to be looking for new prospects?
[This man fearfully avoids your eyes. He couldn't say anything to you even if he wanted.]
You could have found this anywhere! For all we know, you killed Galas!
I have to give you credit... you've led me on quite a chase. But nobody gets away from Calo Nord in the end!
I am ashamed that he would ask outsiders to track such a creature. Why couldn't our own hunters remove his dishonor?
Hold on there! How about talking to me before you go messing with those things? I need your help.
Na abds! Me hoot bad liaz!! Awnts!!
Why did you have to poison the water?? We don't know what effect it could have on the environment around here... or on the kolto.
I am a Sith apprentice now. You place too much faith in what I used to be... and for that you shall pay!
He's taught me a lot. He said I could grow up as strong as him, that I'd fight you too. I will, too. I will.
I... I am too a Sith! I'm more a Sith than you are! I'll show you!!
Please, Bastila... if you feel anything for me, you won't do this!
You can't win, Bastila. Now you must die!
Rorworr is the latest of us to go missing. I hope your outsider slavers lost many men trying to cage him.
Get lost, Sith. I'm not falling for any of your tricks.
I heard the Jedi finally got off their behinds and did something about the Mandalorians! Took them long enough!
Carth... Carth....
Give it up, men. If we don't pay this leech we'll get a black mark on our records a sunspot couldn't burn off.
I know every circuit in droid, and I been in this business too long not to notice clumsy mine placed on bike.
No. If it did, I would never have met you.
Still... [cough] still spouting the wisdom the Jedi, I see. Maybe there is more truth in their code than I ever believed.
I'm all ears, beautiful.
I am no beggar! I just need a little help, is all. There is no one for me to turn to on this wretched planet.
The fight was stopped, but my father did not believe me when I told him about my brother's actions.
Ha! Why didn't you tell me that sooner? You would have saved me a lot of trouble.
Your pass-card is out of date! And I don't recognize you at all! We'll get to the bottom of this soon enough!
The dark side will always triumph over the light! Malak has assured me of victory! You can't defeat me here on the Star Forge! YOU CAN'T!
Ahhhh, but listen to me go on as if I had all the answers. What do I know of love anymore? I'm just a lonely old man who's not even a Jedi.
What? But... but I trusted you! How can you stand there and... and... No, I won't give you the satisfaction.
But... it was not enough...
That is too bad. The hunt will have to wait for you. I can't do this alone.
Well, the wife doesn't really take much of an interest in my work. Not like you. Now, you have questions?
Ha ha! Looks like this one's not afraid of you at all, Lashowe.
We did a good ambush and you and you better pay... uh... maybe 500 credits now! You die otherwise!
Here, take some cred's, if that's what you want. Go drown in a drink, like every other failure in here.
Phew! Don't scare me like that. All right, lesson learned, or whatever. Can you please try to get them going?
You're not getting the holocron. This was my idea! The plan was that I take it back, not you!
No it does not suffice!
Hmph. To think that I actually hoped you could be of use to me.
This isn't tough to figure out, you know. You don't pay, we bury you here!
Thanks again. I doubt any of those uptight hunters would have helped, and I doubt the wife is coming back.
Bastila doesn't stand a chance against Malak, but we can't help her. Not here. We have to get off this ship and find the Star Forge. That's the key to beating the Dark Lord!
But... Gurke said you types have lots of money!
The generator will wrap you in a cloaking effect so you can sneak past the Sith. Just be careful you don't get too close or he might notice someone's there.
Thank you! Thank you, master Jedi! If you find him, please send him home to me. I need him so much!
Don't play dumb. You're just another of his playthings down at that "hunting" club. I know your type through and through.
You underestimate the strength of a Jedi's mind, Brejik - a mistake you won't live to regret!
[Failure] Not with a Matale she won't!
[Force Persuade] You wish to tell us more about this agreement with the Wookiee leadership.
They claim the dark side is evil, but that isn't so. Sometimes anger and hatred are deserved and right. Sometimes things change because of it.
Who are you? You can't come in here! Sound the alarm, Gadon!
Of course it won't happen again if you never trust anyone!
I... I will... it is in... it is in my ship. The cache... it is in a trap door... hidden on my ship...
Hmm, dear dear. I'm saying they both had something to do with it! They've both kept their hands in this from the start!
I've had enough out of you. You either get Czerka authorization to leave or get out of my space.
You there! Human! You are placed under the arrest of the Ahto City Civil Authority!
I am a Sith, now! My power is supreme! Prepare to die, ha ha!!
Get lost, tenderfoot. I hunt desert wraid, I don't babysit.
[Force Persuade] Nothing happened down at the Rift.
Drooling Bomarr cast-off!
I guess you're not quite up to taking the big prize. It's a shame.
Is that a joke? Who do you think you are?
[Force Persuade] You don't need any credits to take them.
[Success] Well, when you put it like that. *ahem* Very well then, if it will get you to help me.
The payoff from research is too much of a risk for Czerka to spend much money on it. Slaves are proven commodities.
[Failure] Uh, no I don't and no I don't. What do you think you are, a Jedi? Heh. That's a laugh.
Go on, leave me be. I will find the holocron myself, if I have to.
The case of Sunry from the Republic is a perfect example of why off-worlders should be expelled from Manaan!
[Failure] ...but I *need* those circuits, master. Please, master... do not destroy my chips out of frustration. Calm yourself, I implore you.
Uh. *That* is one bet I'm not about to take. Not a chance.
[Force Persuade] We are authorized to be here.
No? Blast it! What have they been teaching you children in that academy these days!
I'd, ahh, really appreciate a bit of help. Please?
[How do you wish to use the console?]
There we go.
They were like animals. It was horrible.
I have sworn a life debt to you, Revan. I will serve you as long as I draw breath. I will not break my vow. But you cannot ask me to turn on my best friend.
That doesn't mean a thing! He was there, running from the room!
Well, I'm mad too. There's not much of a retirement plan I can count on if the whole outpost goes belly up. I'll be just like you.
Huh... that didn't go well. Sis always was a little too fiery for her own good. She'll cool down in time.
Then I have... the eternity I deserved. It has taken me... so long to realize that. I made my choice long ago.
Yes? Is there something you wish? I have a moment or two while others post their times.
It used to be a one-on-one test, hunter against hunted. Now, people just want the credits.
Just... go, Dak.
Ha-ha! Smart-mouthed newcomers, to boot.
Preposterous!
Kill them! Kill them now!
I don't see Davik doing anything for his share. We do all the work. Davik claims he's part of the Exchange, so let's see him prove it.
Hey, come on. I don't want any trouble. Here, take what little I have. Just don't hurt me.
Ouch. Heh heh heh. That *is* better. Well, I bet "beautiful" doesn't sound so bad in comparison now, does it?
Please... this is too painful. End it now, quickly. There is no other way.
Dak? That is you, isn't it? I... hardly recognized you.
What! You talk pretty big. Maybe yous should take that back. Gurke and boys tough!
Yeah, we are sick of the talking!
Leave me to my hopelessness!
Now, if we are through, I must get back to my race preparations. I prefer to leave your unpleasantness behind.
[Force Persuade] You haven't warned me. I'm a nice person. You like me.
Greetings again, citizen. Something you need?
At any rate, thank you again. You've saved our lives.
Bring it on!
You are not Revan! Quick, attack the traitor!!
Bastila sacrificed herself so we could get away. We can't let her sacrifice be in vain! Come on!
You've got a bad attitude. Maybe I can adjust it for you!
Wait a minute, let me get this straight. You *lost* your lightsaber? Ha-ha! I mean, isn't that a violation of some kind of Jedi code or something?
*Grunt*
Your friends do not give up easily, Revan; you always could inspire loyalty. But even the three of you together cannot stand against my power!
You could start by telling me what you got Father into that killed him.
There you are! What happened?
I have heard there was some sort of large battle to the south of here between two families of settlers.
You were born out of the loop.
You have this huge destiny waiting for you, and I just fear that if you're alone it could swallow you whole. I mean, is there room in there for me? Will you let me help you?
Greetings, my young friend. I assume you are not a member of the Order, as you are not wearing the traditional garb of the Jedi.
[Success] I won't use droids. You have to make sure the hunt goes on, right? Eh, now, could you help?
Enough! Off-worlders are not to hear of such things!
[Success] Ha ha ha ha! Now *that* has to be the funniest thing I've heard all day.
I wouldn't have any idea who to trust. My husband didn't know most of them... he wasn't a proven hunter yet.
It's better than whatever your chemical will do to the water!
Hahaha! You are most perceptive, I see! Not many people can tell that at first glance.
Yes... what I did was wrong. Very wrong.
Resignation: You have no idea, master. No idea at all. Can we please go and shoot something now?
And though we abandon you, may Bacca lead you through your shame.
[Force Persuade] You don't need to collect the fee.
Carth... *cough*... must tell you... *cough* must tell you something... *cough, cough*... come closer....
We spent everything on my husband's hunting gear. We hoped that the sport would support us. We hoped...
[You try to pick up the gizka, but it wriggles from your grasp and plops back down to the floor.]
I can't attempt this alone. If you won't help, I will have to wait for another hunter to come. The offer stands, if you change your mind.
Well, it's sad to say, but it's that time again, Mekel.
Thank you for saving me. I shall attempt to return to the Enclave on my own. I will tell the Council of what you have done.
Hurry it up, will you? You're not getting through here until I see the proper authorization.
You just keep quiet there, you! I've had to put up with all your busy-body questions, haven't I? Well, now you'll listen to a story, dammit!
There's not enough jobs here for permanent citizens, let alone you spacer drop-ins.
What? Why? What did I do to you?
Come on, what's the matter? Afraid I'll drink you under the table? Hey, if you're not man enough to keep up, who needs you?
I'm still strong enough to defeat you, Bastila!
I have to give you credit... you've led me on quite a chase. But nobody gets away from Calo Nord in the end!
Well, then, I guess "gorgeous" will have to do until then, won't it?
You are beneath my contempt, old man! You hid like a coward for decades on Kashyyyk! You know nothing about the true potential of the Force!
All my secrets are purely of the mundane variety, unfortunately. Nothing worth extracting, though you're welcome to try.
Never! I shall... destroy you first! Die here... remain forever with me!
You will do no such thing! I am your father and I order you to come back with me!
Leave me alone, will you. I've got things on my mind.
There has been a report of a terrible battle near the Sandral estate to the south of the Enclave. Apparently a large force of droids attacked the estate.
Sorry. Didn't mean to... embarass you. I'll stop.
He wouldn't dare!
You are a spy... and a murderer. It was you who killed Juhani and placed this bitter blackness in my heart that I cannot get rid of!
[Failure] Do you really think my mind is that weak? I'm practically insulted. Now instead of trying the easy way out, give me a real answer.
[Success] I suppose you are correct. It won't hurt anything if I just let you on through.
To my shame, Zaalbar was exiled and enslaved. Do you dare claim to be my son's owner, outsider?
[Failure] ...now close the last panel. Hmmm... I am afraid the operation did not succeed, master, though it was a valiant attempt for a meatbag.
It was all thanks to this kind Jedi that we managed to get this far at all. I thank you Jedi, for all that you have done for us.
Do not let your attention waver! Strike her down!!
No! Rahasia! I'll kill you!
Bah! I can't be bothered with fools! Perhaps... I should... hmmm.
I can do whatever I want! You can't control me!
We know about the station and our personnel there! What has happened to them?
Oh, my!
Well... yeah, true enough, I guess. But, damn it, I'm tired of nobody telling me anything!
You ever tried this Tarisian extra-dark ale? It's very good - Brejik doesn't skimp on the refreshments around here - I'll give him that!
I'm just a soldier; I go where the fleet Admirals tell me to. I follow my orders and I do my duty. It just... *sigh* doesn't seem right that doing that means I failed them! I didn't!
And so it ends as I somehow always knew it must: in darkness.
So why don't you get this whole farce over with and send that whiner Handon to the prison he belongs in!
Use the Force, then. Look into your heart and you will realize what is truth and what is lies.
What? Oh, right, thanks. I guess I'll just DIE! Come on, help a guy out!
Where did you get that, outsider? Did you have someone steal it? Have you sunk to petty theft now?
You can't win, Bastila. Now you must die!
Ask the human what happened!
[Force Persuade] You want to come out of that room. You feel safe with us.
I... would prefer not to discuss that.
[Failure] You... must think I am a great f-fool! Go away! I will get in, I will!
And you'd better appreciate it!
